summary:
Available from: November 2023

I am a self-motivated and hard-working experienced professional and freelancer.

I am confident and positive, with a 'can-do' attitude. 
I enjoy working together as a team and one to one. 
Furthermore, I will always assist colleagues and find solutions where needed. 
Contributing to a happy, fun and caring work environment is important to me. 
 
In 2022 I trained myself in agile, scrum (PSM I), and data to be ready for a job as a Product Owner.
This year I started to work for TomTom as an Executive Assistant. For 3 years I was the Product Owner for a Belgium airline.  

I have 20+ years' experience in Project Management, Customer Service, Legal Affairs, and leading a team of 10+ co-workers and interns. 

Do not hesitate to contact me for job offers like Project Assistant, Executive Assistant or Product Owner!

#freelance #zzp #productowner #scrum #agile #teamlead #projects #data

profile_positions.description: Provide administrative and organizational support, calendar management and travel booking. Write documents, prepare agendas for meetings and follow up on progress. Central point of contact, prioritize inquiries and requests if needed troubleshooting. Help drive projects and organize events.

profile_positions.description:
I am a member of the Techology domain of the cooperative 'Haal meer uit je Regio', which consists of a group of passionate volunteers who together provide all the necessary technological knowledge and support that is needed for the cooperative and its domains needs, in the field of information and communication.

From March 2022 till Januari 2023 I was studying at Techinonista Academy and Scrum.org. 
I provide 'mantelzorg' and help with WOO (Wet Open Overheid) requests.
profile_positions.title: Participant Local Cooperation HaalMeerUitjeRegio

profile_positions.description:
Product Owner of automation process delayed flights in contact with Customer Relations, Financial Department, Operations Control, Maintenance, Ground Operations & PR department
Led a team of 10 co-workers and interns
Analyzed and reported on delayed flights according to European legislation
Processed 20,000+ claims and 1000+ lawsuits from legal aid firms and claim companies
profile_positions.title: Teamleader & Product Owner (Passenger Rights) Netherlands & Belgium

profile_positions.description:
Led a team of 10 co-workers and interns
Analyzed and reported on delayed flights according to European legislation
Processed 40,000+ claims and 500+ lawsuits from legal aid firms and claim companies
Organized and standardized data flow, from gathered to shared information about a delayed flight
Improved, developed and implemented systems for automated claim handling 
Contact with Customer Relations, Financial Department, Operations Control, Ground Operations, PR department, Translation department, lawyers in several European countries, lease companies and local authorities
profile_positions.title: Teamleader & Project Manager (Passenger Rights) Netherlands & Belgium

profile_positions.description:
Led a team of 6 employees and interns
Analyzed and reported on delayed flights according to European legislation
Processed 20,000+ claims, 800+ administrative lawsuits and 200+ civil lawsuits

Developed evidence processing digital workflow and defense processing workflow with lawyers

Presentations for crew, pilots, travel agents and Customer Relations

Organized and handled claims about delayed flights and assisted with calamities
Finalized project with Customer Relations to integrate the airline complaints with the tour operator
Trained employees and made a handbook for airline complaints like Lost & Found 
Finalized several small projects for the starting airlines
profile_positions.title: Paralegal Customer Relations & Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Examined, measured and analyzed the performance of processes in order to guarantee and optimize quality
Working according to the principles of 'Six Sigma' and 'Prince2'
I was a member of the department Process management responsible for the customer experience
Drawing up and monitoring uniformity of travel conditions and information to customers
Writing handbook for complaints handling with reimbursement guidelines and claim procedures
Writing work processes and assisted to give input for 'Hay-method' job evaluation system
Assisted the Health & Safety Coordinator during tsunami Sri Lanka, 9/11 and several bomb attacks
Had 24/7 duty for Calamities
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Quality Assurance

profile_positions.description:

Reporting to Management and giving feedback on weekly meetings 
Finalized Projects on workflow improvement & implemented digital Complaints Management System  
Led Calamities and had 24/7 duty

volunteer_experiences.description: Mensen helpen met de financiële administratie

Helpen bij de activiteiten op de basisschool OBS Kudelstaart zoals feestdagen, sportdagen, schoolreis, avond 4-daagse en notuleren vergaderingen. Ook het opzetten van activiteiten kaarten waar voor de verschillende activiteiten de benodigde spullen (bv. boodschappen) en taken (optuigen Kerstboom) op een rijtje staan.
